real war, is won by coordination and psychology.

367.text:

comprised of folk pulling on the rope.

371.text:

whose sole job it is to stand on the sides

376.text:

380.text:

399.text: tear the other team up off the ground.

611.text: This is actually really, really simple.

612.text: Force in Newtons is simply mass time acceleration.

616.text: Acceleration is velocity divided by time.

617.text:

meters-per-second-squared, which gives us

621.text:

20 kilonewtons.
